This game is genre defining classic.
Very unique concept and has an amazing story along with fun puzzles. The storyline ramps up near the end and is expanded upon more during the sequel. Great game 10/10
It is a very funny and has a good story 10/10

Def what I would call a modern classic at the time I played. I really enjoyed the minimalistic atmosphere that lets you focus on the challenge and builds pressure for you to figure it out quickly or be terminated.  It was a very fun albeit short game but, left a lasting impression.
Stop reading the reviews and go play it NOW.
